import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { FormGroup, FormBuilder } from '@angular/forms'; @Component({ selector: 'app-basic-pages', templateUrl: './basic-pages.component.html', styleUrls: ['./basic-pages.component.css'] }) export class BasicPagesComponent { public myForm: FormGroup = this.fb.group({ name : [''], price: [0], inStorage : [0], }); constructor(private fb: FormBuilder) { } public onSave(): void { console.log(this.myForm.value); this.myForm.reset(); } }
